0x3000	0010000000010011		LD	R0 X
0x3001	0010001000010011		LD	R1 Y
0x3002	0100100000000010		JSR	SUB
0x3003	0100100000000110		JSR	MULT
0x3004	0100100000001110		JSR	END
0x3005	1001011001111111	SUB	NOT	R3 R1
0x3006	0001011011100001		ADD	R3 R3 #1
0x3007	0001011000000011		ADD	R3 R0 R3
0x3008	0011011000001101		ST	R3 XY
0x3009	1100000111000000		RET	
0x300A	0101101101100000	MULT	AND	R5 R5 #0
0x300B	0101110110100000		AND	R6 R6 #0
0x300C	0001101101000000		ADD	R5 R5 R0
0x300D	0001101101111111		ADD	R5 R5 #-1
0x300E	0001110110000001	LOOP	ADD	R6 R6 R1
0x300F	0001101101111111		ADD	R5 R5 #-1
0x3010	0000011111111101		BRzp	LOOP
0x3011	0011110000000101		ST	R6 MUL
0x3012	1100000111000000		RET	
0x3013	1111000000100101		END	TRAP	HALT
0x3014	0000000000001010		X		
0x3015	0000000000001000		Y		
0x3016	0000000000000010		XY		
0x3017	0000000001010000		MUL
